$comment: This schema defines the configuration values for the IDOT Helm chart. It validates the structure and required fields for proper deployment.

instanaKey.description: x-instana-key: The Instana agent key to use; only needed to send telemetry data to Instana Backend.

clusterShortName.description: k8s.cluster.shortName: Short name of the cluster.

clusterName.description: k8s.cluster.name: Name for the Kubernetes cluster.

clusterFullName.description: k8s.cluster.fullName: Full name of the cluster.

clusterDistribution.description: k8s.cluster.distribution: Name of the cluster distribution.

clusterManagedBy.description: k8s.cluster.managedBy: Name of the organization managing the cluster.

namespaceName.description: k8s.namespace.name: Namespace of the Kubernetes cluster.

serviceInstanceId.description: service.instance.id: Service instance ID for tracing.

serviceName.description: service.name: Service name for use in tracing.

INSTANA_PLUGIN.description: INSTANA_PLUGIN: Mandatory constant for use internally by Instana.

enabled.description: Force OpenShift mode even if not auto-detected

autoDetect.description: Automatically detect if running on OpenShift

usePrivilegedServiceAccount.description: When true and running on OpenShift, use a custom service account with privileged SCC
